snippet.title: Imperialism SSI (1997) Windows 95/98
snippet.description:
█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█▀█
♦ Title: Imperialism 
♦ Publisher: SSI
♦ Developer: Frog City Software
♦ Published: 1997
♦ Genre: Strategy
♦ Format: Windows 95
♠ Emulator: PCEM V 11.1
       ◙ Pentium 166 MMX
       ◙ Windows 98 SE
       ◙ 128 mbs 
       ◙ S3 Virge 4 mbs 
       ◙ 3dfx Voodoo 2 12 mbs
♠ Recording Device: Avermedia Gamer HD PCI-Express
♠ Recording Resolution: 1368 x 720 @ 30 FPS
▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
♦ Imperialism SSI (1997) Original Game @ Amazon
       • https://amzn.to/2D5p3f8
♦ Imperialism SSI reference cards
       • https://archive.org/details/imperialism1997ssireferencedatacard
       • https://archive.org/details/imperialismssireferenceposter
♦ Imperialism SSI Demo @ Abandonware
      • https://archive.org/details/IMPDEMO

▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
♦ Other SSI Videos

◙ People's General (1998) SSI Eastern Campaign Mission 1: Khabarovsk

• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oT8kIT0ljsI

◙ Steel Panthers

• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9AJFqFzlhQQ

◙ Steel Panthers II: Modern Battles SSI MS DOS 6.2

• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gkrMwUeGQ9k

◙ Steel Panthers III (1997) Dos Intro

• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=30HE2vnn4hw

◙ Steel Panthers III on PCEM V13.1 with MS-DOS 6.22

• https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vVG5Tyd01jk

◙ Steel Panthers III (1997) Dos Gameplay

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hMQMsK71igk
